segments.text: I see a woman in the kitchen, seemingly lost in her own world as she dries a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight streams through the open window, illuminating the cheerful garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my gaze drifts down to the overflowing sink; water spills over the edge without anyone noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how oblivious she is to the chaos unfolding just behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is precariously perched on a wobbly stool, reaching into a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me anxious to watch himâ€”a single misstep could send him crashing to the ground.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is so eager, one hand raised, waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocence in this moment is both charming and troubling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman ever looks up from her task to see the world around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the chaos inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
